uppaḷāseti：upaḷāseti [ud-pra-Ias 的 caus．] 發出聲音，使鳴響．
uppaḷāseti：upaḷāseti [ud-pra-las の caus．] 音を出す，鳴らす．
uppaḷāseti，upaḷāseti  [ud-pra-las の caus．] 音を出す，鳴らす
Uppaḷāseti，[ud + pra + las，cp．Sk．samullāsayati in same meaning] to sound out or forth，to make sound Miln．21 （dhamma-saṅkhaṁ）．Reading at D．II，337 is upaḷāseti in same meaning．（Page 152）
